notifyOptimalChargeReached.longMessage: Your optimal charge on '{{chargeBoxID}}' has been reached.

notifyChargingStationRegistered.message: '{{chargeBoxID}}' just got registered to the central server.
notifyChargingStationRegistered.longMessage: '{{chargeBoxID}}' just got registered to the central server.

notifyUnknownUserBadged.message: An unknown user has just badged on '{{chargeBoxID}}'.
notifyUnknownUserBadged.longMessage: An unknown user has just badged on '{{chargeBoxID}}'.
